IMAGE_TOOLS_HIDE_NATIVE_BUTTONS_NOTE: Hide image buttons in messages context menu
IMAGE_TOOLS_DISABLE_ANTI_ALIASING_NOTE: Disable anti aliasing image in lens
IMAGE_TOOLS_RESIZE_IMAGES_NOTE: Increase the size of images in modals
IMAGE_TOOLS_LENS_BORDER_COLOR_NOTE: The default is the "interactive-hover" color of your theme
IMAGE_TOOLS_ZOOM_RATIO_NOTE: Magnifying the image in the lens
IMAGE_TOOLS_NOT_HOSTING_DISCORD: The image is probably not hosted by Discord
IMAGE_TOOLS_HIDE_HINTS_NOTE: Hide the second line of some buttons for compactness
IMAGE_TOOLS_DEFAULT_ACTION_NOTE: Default action when clicking on the general button
IMAGE_TOOLS_SAVE_DIR_NOTE: Folders to be used to quickly save the image
IMAGE_TOOLS_LOW_PRIORITY_NOTE: Hide disabled extensions from selection if there are other options
IMAGE_TOOLS_COMPRESSION_NOTE: The smaller the faster the image will be loaded, but the quality suffers. Discord value by default ~50%
IMAGE_TOOLS_OFF_SCROLLING_OUTSIDE: Turn off scrolling outside the image
IMAGE_TOOLS_OFF_SCROLLING_OUTSIDE_NOTE: When the cursor is out of the image, lens settings cannot be changed
